column4: I'm new to Ubuntu, as I installed it last night... It's mostly wonderful, but I don't have any sound... The driver is fine, and it's playing, but no sound. The speakers are set to max.
have you take all the updates ?
and select alsa for all the 4 menu list
never mind *giggle* I seeped to have paused it somehow
Rythmbox seems to be playing fine, tere's just no sound.
Sorry, don't understand what you're asking :(
New to Ubuntu, I'm not into all the terms yet
run that command and tell me if you can hear any  sound
